content.rendered: “1/2.7″” 2Megapixel CMOS 25/30fps@1080P, 25/30/50/60fps@720P 120dB ture WDR ICR, OSD, 2.7-12mm motorized lens Max. IR distance: 60m(197ft), Smart IR HDCVI/CVBS outputs DC12V, IP67″
